author: wjaniszewski
msg: Added configurable timeout and cookies for service bindings. Consequence is that one SCA-Erlang node is created excusively for one service binding, so service bindings cannot share the same value in 'node' attribute like it was before. Made some other fixes.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1212: Introduced JmsKeyFormatStrategy for pluggable encoder/decoder for JMS keys.

author: ctan
msg: [CONTINUUM-2140] fix backup/restore of ContinuumReleaseResult, BuildDefinitionTemplate, DirectoryPurgeConfiguration, and RepositoryPurgeConfiguration.

Include the RepositoryPurgeConfiguration during restore. Comment out for now because of NPE, which is caused by how the RepositoryPurgeConfiguration is being written by ContinuumStaxWriter (LocalRepository first before the id).

author: eglynn
msg: [dOSGi] Updated to latest Discovery APIs & semantics
